meanings.definition: Of or relating to a morula.
meanings.sent1: The morular cells were carefully studied by the scientists.
meanings.sent2: The morular structure was crucial for understanding the development process.
meanings.sent3: The morular pattern on the fabric looked quite unique.
meanings.sent4: Her morular necklace added an interesting texture to her outfit.
meanings.sent5: The morular design on the cake made it stand out at the party.

meanings.definition: Resembling a mulberry; having a bumpy surface.
meanings.sent1: The morular texture of the rock made it difficult to climb.
meanings.sent2: The morular skin of the fruit felt rough to the touch.
meanings.sent3: The morular road caused the car to bump along.
meanings.sent4: Her morular scarf added a playful touch to her outfit.
meanings.sent5: The morular clouds in the sky looked like fluffy cotton balls.

meanings.definition: A stage in embryonic development consisting of a solid ball of cells.
meanings.sent1: The morular is an important phase in the growth of an embryo.
meanings.sent2: Scientists observed the morular under the microscope.
meanings.sent3: The morular seemed like a tiny world of its own.
meanings.sent4: The morular stage is crucial for the formation of tissues.
meanings.sent5: The morular structure eventually develops into a blastocyst.
